text: Kluczynski Federal Building (before Chicago Federal Center) is a modernist skyscraper in the downtown Chicago Loop located at 230 South Dearborn Street. The 45-story structure was designed by Ludwig Mies van der Rohe and completed in 1974. It is tall. It holds the offices of both Illinois senators Mark Kirk and Dick Durbin. ==References== Category:Skyscrapers in Chicago Category:1974 establishments in the United States
title: Kluczynski Federal Building
